Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Oversight and Investigations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the automatic waiver of certain additional penalties for a parking violation if a vehicle owner responds to a notice of violation between forty-five and ninety days of its issuance
Items.MatterName: Automatic waiver of certain additional penalties for a parking violation if a vehicle owner responds to a notice of violation between forty-five and ninety days of its issuance.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Oversight and Investigations
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring curb extensions at certain dangerous intersections
Items.MatterName: Requiring curb extensions at certain dangerous intersections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to consider placement of traffic enforcement agents in developing an interagency roadway safety plan
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOT to consider placement of traffic enforcement agents in developing an interagency roadway safety plan.

Items.MatterName: Adding an investment roadmap to the streets master plan,

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a task force to study options, report on, and make recommendations for potential locations for the construction of a bus depot in Flushing, Queens
